thread.title: Doctor J
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Doctor J

author: Doctor J
title: Doctor J
text:
I was traveling overseas and needed a pocket sized Lonely Planet book for translation. The book arrived right on time as promised and helped me immensely. The price was much less than at the bookstore and available whereas the book store did not carry that language. Excellent service.
Thank you Thrift Books!
